measure.name: ornl_two_story_frp_model
measure.description: This measure will make the ORNL Two Story Flexible Research Platrom OpenStudio Model.
measure.modeler_description:
This will start with an OSM file in the resoruce directory. Simulation settings, geometry, constructions, and schedules will come in with the IDF. Schedules will need to be converted to Rulset Schedules so they will work with downstream measures. Schedules may need to be overridden from external resource data unique to a specific test configuraiton. EMS will need to be updated, and HVAC systems will need to be rebuilt.
At some point the OSM could become the working model that gets updated and converted to IDF as needed. In that case this meaure be needed. There will be a mostly complete OSM model that just uses measure to adapt operational characteristics as needed.

argument.name: hvac_mode
argument.display_name: Select HVAC Mode

argument.name: dx_curves
argument.display_name: Select DX Curves

argument.name: fan_curves
argument.display_name: Select Fan Curves

argument.name: fan_eff
argument.display_name: Fan Efficiency

argument.name: fan_pr
argument.display_name: Fan Pressure Rise

argument.name: fan_max_flow
argument.display_name: Fan Maximum Flow Rate

argument.name: fan_power_at_min
argument.display_name: Fan Power at Minimum Flow Rate

argument.name: dst
argument.display_name: Enable Daylight Savings Time

argument.name: setpoint_temp_floor
argument.display_name: Floor for Air Loop Supply Setpoint Temperature

argument.name: oa_threshold_for_setpoint_floor
argument.display_name: Outdoor Dry Bulb Temperature at or above which the airloop setpoint should reach the floor.

argument.name: setpoint_temp_ceiling
argument.display_name: Ceiling for Air Loop Supply Setpoint Temperature

argument.name: oa_threshold_for_setpoint_ceiling
argument.display_name: Outdoor Dry Bulb Temperature at or below which the airloop setpoint should reach the ceiling.

argument.name: stp_mgr
argument.display_name: Air Loop Setpoint Strategy.

argument.name: infil_sch_arg
argument.display_name: Select Infiltration Schedule Behavior

argument.name: infil_redu_day_weekend
argument.display_name: Fractional reduction in schedule for weekend vs. weekday.
argument.description: This is only used if Infiltration Schedule Behavior is det to dynamic_infil

argument.name: infil_redu_day_ff
argument.display_name: Fractional reduction in schedule for free float vs. weekend.
argument.description: This is only used if Infiltration Schedule Behavior is det to dynamic_infil

argument.name: infil_redu_night
argument.display_name: Fractional reduction in schedule for night vs. free float.
argument.description: This is only used if Infiltration Schedule Behavior is det to dynamic_infil

argument.name: int_mass_first_thin_area
argument.display_name: Area of thin internal mass per first story space, except where overriden by arguments below.
argument.description: Thin internal mass is modeled as 1/16th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_first_thick_area
argument.display_name: Area of thick internal mass per first story space, except where overriden by arguments below.
argument.description: Thick internal mass is modeled as 1/4th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_second_thin_area
argument.display_name: Area of thin internal mass per second story space, except where overriden by arguments below.
argument.description: Thin internal mass is modeled as 1/16th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_second_thick_area
argument.display_name: Area of thick internal mass per second story space, except where overriden by arguments below.
argument.description: Thick internal mass is modeled as 1/4th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_plenum_thin_area
argument.display_name: Area of thin internal mass per plenum space.
argument.description: Thin internal mass is modeled as 1/16th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_plenum_thick_area
argument.display_name: Area of thick internal mass per plenum space.
argument.description: Thick internal mass is modeled as 1/4th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_stair_thin_area
argument.display_name: Area of thin internal mass per stair space.
argument.description: Thin internal mass is modeled as 1/16th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_stair_thick_area
argument.display_name: Area of thick internal mass per stair space.
argument.description: Thick internal mass is modeled as 1/4th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_room_105_thin_area
argument.display_name: Area of thin internal mass for room 105.
argument.description: Thin internal mass is modeled as 1/16th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_room_105_thick_area
argument.display_name: Area of thick internal mass for room 105.
argument.description: Thick internal mass is modeled as 1/4th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_room_106_thin_area
argument.display_name: Area of thin internal mass for room 106.
argument.description: Thin internal mass is modeled as 1/16th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_room_106_thick_area
argument.display_name: Area of thick internal mass for room 106.
argument.description: Thick internal mass is modeled as 1/4th inch metal

argument.name: int_mass_multiplier
argument.display_name: Global Internal Mass Multiplier
argument.description: For use with calibration a single multiplier applied to values above in area of internal mass

argument.name: add_water_tanks
argument.display_name: Add mass for 4 x 200 gallon non insulated water tanks to Room 105.

argument.name: shgc_multiplier
argument.display_name: SHGC Multiplier
argument.description: Changes default SHGC value entered for Double Pane material used for external windows in the model.

argument.name: ufactor_multiplier
argument.display_name: U Factor Multiplier
argument.description: Changes default U Factor value entered for Double Pane material used for external windows in the model.
